channel.title: Trip on A sea kayak story
channel.description: Recent content in Trip on A sea kayak story

item.title: Trip
item.description: The trip stats completed 13th of July 2024 started 21st of June 2023 13 paddling days 9 overnight tent campings 3 breaks (weather and running out of vacation days) 200 nautical miles in 9 days 2023 (exhausting weather and sea state) 114 nautical miles in 4 days 2024 (superb conditions) 314 nautical miles (581 km or 361 statute miles): day 5 (the most exhausing day, rain, misty and strong offshore wind) day 7 (the 7 cell storms, 5 behind, 2 ahead) day 8 (the biggest water)
